cart.cartNotFound: The '{cartId}' cart is not found in your cart
cart.itemStatusIsNotInStock: The item with {itemId} id is {itemStatus}, please choose another one

item.itemSizeNotFound: The '{itemId}' item size is not found in the system
item.itemNotFound: The '{itemId}' item is not found in the system

order.orderNotFound: The '{orderId}' order is not found in the system
order.orderCannotBeCancelled: The order with ID '{orderId}' cannot be canceled since the shop has already accepted it. Please contact support for further assistance if needed.
order.orderStatusCannotBeUpdated: The order with ID '{orderId}' cannot be updated since the customer has already cancelled it. Please contact again with customer.
order.invalidOrderStatusTransition: The order with ID '{orderId}' cannot be updated due to an invalid status update sequence.

auth.accountPermissionDenied: You do not have permission to access the order with ID '{orderId}'

category.categoryNotFound: The {categoryId} category is not found in the system

account.accountNotFound: Account with ID '{accountId}' not found in the system
account.emailAlreadyExists: This email is already existed in the system.

voucher.voucherOutOfStock: Voucher with ID {voucherId} is out of stock.
voucher.startAtMustBeLessThanEndAt: The start date must be less than the end date.
voucher.minPriceExceeded: The total price must be at least {minPrice} to use voucher with ID {voucherId}.
voucher.voucherNotValid: Voucher with ID {voucherId} is not valid at this time.
voucher.voucherCodeExisted: This voucher code {code} was already existed in the system.
